mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.InvalidMasterListCodeException
mdException.label: Invalid Code
mdException.description: Thrown when a user enters an invalid name for a Master List.
mdException.message: Invalid Code. No spaces or special characters such as <, >, -, +, =, !, @, #, $, %, ^, &, *, ?,/, \ or apostrophes are allowed.
